title: Responsive Google Homepage Design
description: A responsive mockup of the Google homepage built with ReactJS and Material UI Build with a mobile-first approach in mind.

title: New York Times Article Recreation
description: An exercise from the Odin Project. A Recreation of an article from the New York Times. Mobile-responsive. Built using plain Javascript, HTML, and CSS.

title: MV Santiago Wellness Center Appointment System
description: Project for my thesis subject. An appointment system for MV Santiago Wellness Center, located in Trece Martires, Cavite.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Forbidden Memories Pygame Remake
description: A remake of the classic PSX game Yu-Gi-Oh! Forbidden memories made using Python and Pygame. Unfinished and currently on hiatus, has functional enemy AI that can fuse cards, select appropriate guardian stars, and battle intelligently.

title: Smashing Magazine Frontpage Recreation
description: Recreation of the frontpage of Smashing Magazine. Made using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JS.

title: Simple Ecommerce Site
description: An mobile-responsive simple e-commerce site built using ReactJS and Commerce.js.

title: Memory Card Game
description: A memory exercise game from the Odin Project. Select 12 images from the screen, but do not click on an image more than once! Built using React.JS, HTML, and CSS.

title: Restaurant
description: My submission for the Shopping Cart section of the Odin Project React.JS course.

title: Old Apple Homepage Recreation
description: Activity Recreating the old Apple website homepage A project in the Odin Project HTML/CSS course.

title: Responsive YouTube Page
description: An HTML and CSS exercise from the Odin Project. A reproduction of a youtube page that is mobile-responsive.

title: To-Do List
description: A to-do list built using HTML, CSS, and Javascript. Uses localstorage API to store data in a session.

title: Intuit Login Form Copy
description: A copy of the login form of Intuit.

title: Etch-a-sketch
description: A multicolored etch-a-sketch grid. Each successive pass to an already visited box makes it darker until it becomes black.

title: Where's Waldo? Disney Edition
description: A Disney twist on the classic game Where's Waldo. Find three Disney characters among the crowd!

title: Weather App
description: A weather information app developed using the OpenWeatherMap API. Just enter a city to the search box and get the latest weather report for that particular location.
